CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Open"),TEXT(FLOOR( 17 *(( 5 * FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( NOW() ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD( DATEVALUE( NOW() ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7) + MIN( 1, 24 / 17 * ( MOD( NOW() - DATETIMEVALUE( '1900-01-08 16:00:00' ), 1 ) ) ) ) ) - ( 5 * FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( opened_at__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATEVALUE( opened_at__c ) - DATE( 1996, 1, 1), 7 ) + MIN( 1, 24 / 17 * ( MOD( opened_at__c - DATETIMEVALUE( '1900-01-08 16:00:00' ), 1) ) ) ) ) ))) & " Hours " & TEXT( ROUND( MOD( (NOW() - opened_at__c ) * 24 * 59, 59 ), 0 ) ) & " minutes", '0 Hours 0 minutes' )
CustomField.label: tempIdleAge
